plot: A struggling PHD student tries to save his failing academic career by breaking up with his girlfriend. The after-effects keep him more distracted than she ever did.
title: Orange Hair
plot_es: A struggling PHD student tries to save his failing academic career by breaking up with his girlfriend. The after-effects keep him more distracted than she ever did.
plot_en: A struggling PHD student tries to save his failing academic career by breaking up with his girlfriend. The after-effects keep him more distracted than she ever did.
